verses.verse: Now these are the names <WH8034> of the tribes <WH7626>. From the north <WH6828> end <WH7097> to the coast <WH3027> of the way <WH1870> of Hethlon <WH2855>, as one goeth <WH935> <WH8800> to Hamath <WH2574>, Hazarenan <WH2704>, the border <WH1366> of Damascus <WH1834> northward <WH6828>, to the coast <WH3027> of Hamath <WH2574>; for these are his sides <WH6285> east <WH6921> and west <WH3220>; a <WH259> portion for Dan <WH1835>.
And by the border <WH1366> of Dan <WH1835>, from the east <WH6921> side <WH6285> unto the west <WH3220> side <WH6285>, a <WH259> portion for Asher <WH836>.
And by the border <WH1366> of Asher <WH836>, from the east <WH6921> side <WH6285> even unto the west <WH3220> side <WH6285>, a <WH259> portion for Naftali <WH5321>.
And by the border <WH1366> of Naftali <WH5321>, from the east <WH6921> side <WH6285> unto the west <WH3220> side <WH6285>, a <WH259> portion for M'nasheh <WH4519>.
And by the border <WH1366> of M'nasheh <WH4519>, from the east <WH6921> side <WH6285> unto the west <WH3220> side <WH6285>, a <WH259> portion for Efrayim <WH669>.
And by the border <WH1366> of Efrayim <WH669>, from the east <WH6921> side <WH6285> even unto the west <WH3220> side <WH6285>, a <WH259> portion for Re'uven <WH7205>.
And by the border <WH1366> of Re'uven <WH7205>, from the east <WH6921> side <WH6285> unto the west <WH3220> side <WH6285>, a <WH259> portion for Y'hudah <WH3063>.

And by the border <WH1366> of Y'hudah <WH3063>, from the east <WH6921> side <WH6285> unto the west <WH3220> side <WH6285>, shall be the offering <WH8641> which ye shall offer <WH7311> <WH8686> of five <WH2568> and twenty <WH6242> thousand <WH505> reeds in breadth <WH7341>, and in length <WH753> as one <WH259> of the other parts <WH2506>, from the east <WH6921> side <WH6285> unto the west <WH3220> side <WH6285>: and the sanctuary <WH4720> shall be in the midst <WH8432> of it.

The oblation <WH8641> that ye shall offer <WH7311> <WH8686> unto the YY <WH3068> shall be of five <WH2568> and twenty <WH6242> thousand <WH505> in length <WH753>, and of ten <WH6235> thousand <WH505> in breadth <WH7341>.

And for them, even for the Kohanim <WH3548>, shall be this holy <WH6944> oblation <WH8641>; toward the north <WH6828> five <WH2568> and twenty <WH6242> thousand <WH505> in length, and toward the west <WH3220> ten <WH6235> thousand <WH505> in breadth <WH7341>, and toward the east <WH6921> ten <WH6235> thousand <WH505> in breadth <WH7341>, and toward the south <WH5045> five <WH2568> and twenty <WH6242> thousand <WH505> in length <WH753>: and the sanctuary <WH4720> of the YY <WH3068> shall be in the midst <WH8432> thereof.

It shall be for the Kohanim <WH3548> that are sanctified <WH6942> <WH8794> of the sons <WH1121> of Zadok <WH6659>; which have kept <WH8104> <WH8804> my charge <WH4931>, which went not astray <WH8582> <WH8804> when the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> went astray <WH8582> <WH8800>, as the L'vi'im <WH3881> went astray <WH8582> <WH8804>.
And this oblation <WH8642> of the land <WH776> that is offered <WH8641> shall be unto them a thing most <WH6944> holy <WH6944> by the border <WH1366> of the L'vi'im <WH3881>.

And over against <WH5980> the border <WH1366> of the Kohanim <WH3548> the L'vi'im <WH3881> shall have five <WH2568> and twenty <WH6242> thousand <WH505> in length <WH753>, and ten <WH6235> thousand <WH505> in breadth <WH7341>: all the length <WH753> shall be five <WH2568> and twenty <WH6242> thousand <WH505>, and the breadth <WH7341> ten <WH6235> thousand <WH505>.

And they shall not sell <WH4376> <WH8799> of it, neither exchange <WH4171> <WH8686>, nor alienate <WH5674> <WH8686> <WH8675> <WH5674> <WH8799> the firstfruits <WH7225> of the land <WH776>: for it is holy <WH6944> unto the YY <WH3068>.

And the five <WH2568> thousand <WH505>, that are left <WH3498> <WH8737> in the breadth <WH7341> over against <WH6440> the five <WH2568> and twenty <WH6242> thousand <WH505>, shall be a profane <WH2455> place for the city <WH5892>, for dwelling <WH4186>, and for suburbs <WH4054>: and the city <WH5892> shall be in the midst <WH8432> thereof.

And these shall be the measures <WH4060> thereof; the north <WH6828> side <WH6285> four <WH702> thousand <WH505> and five <WH2568> hundred <WH3967>, and the south <WH5045> side <WH6285> four <WH702> thousand <WH505> and five <WH2568> hundred <WH3967>, and on the east <WH6921> side <WH6285> four <WH702> thousand <WH505> and five <WH2568> hundred <WH3967>, and the west <WH3220> side <WH6285> four <WH702> thousand <WH505> and five <WH2568> <WH8675> <WH2568> hundred <WH3967>.

And the suburbs <WH4054> of the city <WH5892> shall be toward the north <WH6828> two hundred <WH3967> and fifty <WH2572>, and toward the south <WH5045> two hundred <WH3967> and fifty <WH2572>, and toward the east <WH6921> two hundred <WH3967> and fifty <WH2572>, and toward the west <WH3220> two hundred <WH3967> and fifty <WH2572>.

And the residue <WH3498> <WH8737> in length <WH753> over against <WH5980> the oblation <WH8641> of the holy <WH6944> portion shall be ten <WH6235> thousand <WH505> eastward <WH6921>, and ten <WH6235> thousand <WH505> westward <WH3220>: and it shall be over against <WH5980> the oblation <WH8641> of the holy <WH6944> portion; and the increase <WH8393> thereof shall be for food <WH3899> unto them that serve <WH5647> <WH8802> the city <WH5892>.
And they that serve <WH5647> <WH8802> the city <WH5892> shall serve <WH5647> <WH8799> it out of all the tribes <WH7626> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>.

All the oblation <WH8641> shall be five <WH2568> and twenty <WH6242> thousand <WH505> by five <WH2568> and twenty <WH6242> thousand <WH505>: ye shall offer <WH7311> <WH8686> the holy <WH6944> oblation <WH8641> foursquare <WH7243>, with the possession <WH272> of the city <WH5892>.

And the residue <WH3498> <WH8737> shall be for the prince <WH5387>, on the one side and on the other of the holy <WH6944> oblation <WH8641>, and of the possession <WH272> of the city <WH5892>, over against <WH6440> the five <WH2568> and twenty <WH6242> thousand <WH505> of the oblation <WH8641> toward the east <WH6921> border <WH1366>, and westward <WH3220> over against <WH6440> the five <WH2568> and twenty <WH6242> thousand <WH505> toward the west <WH3220> border <WH1366>, over against <WH5980> the portions <WH2506> for the prince <WH5387>: and it shall be the holy <WH6944> oblation <WH8641>; and the sanctuary <WH4720> of the house <WH1004> shall be in the midst <WH8432> thereof.

Moreover from the possession <WH272> of the L'vi'im <WH3881>, and from the possession <WH272> of the city <WH5892>, being in the midst <WH8432> of that which is the prince's <WH5387>, between the border <WH1366> of Y'hudah <WH3063> and the border <WH1366> of Binyamin <WH1144>, shall be for the prince <WH5387>.
As for the rest <WH3499> of the tribes <WH7626>, from the east <WH6921> side <WH6285> unto the west <WH3220> side <WH6285>, Binyamin <WH1144> shall have a <WH259> portion.
And by the border <WH1366> of Binyamin <WH1144>, from the east <WH6921> side <WH6285> unto the west <WH3220> side <WH6285>, SHim`on <WH8095> shall have a <WH259> portion.
And by the border <WH1366> of SHim`on <WH8095>, from the east <WH6921> side <WH6285> unto the west <WH3220> side <WH6285>, Yissakhar <WH3485> a <WH259> portion.
And by the border <WH1366> of Yissakhar <WH3485>, from the east <WH6921> side <WH6285> unto the west <WH3220> side <WH6285>, Z'vulun <WH2074> a <WH259> portion.
And by the border <WH1366> of Z'vulun <WH2074>, from the east <WH6921> side <WH6285> unto the west <WH3220> side <WH6285>, Gad <WH1410> a <WH259> portion.

And by the border <WH1366> of Gad <WH1410>, at the south <WH5045> side <WH6285> southward <WH8486>, the border <WH1366> shall be even from Tamar <WH8559> unto the waters <WH4325> of strife <WH4808> <WH8677> <WH4809> in Kadesh <WH6946>, and to the river <WH5158> toward the great <WH1419> sea <WH3220>.

This is the land <WH776> which ye shall divide <WH5307> <WH8686> by lot unto the tribes <WH7626> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> for inheritance <WH5159>, and these are their portions <WH4256>, saith <WH5002> <WH8803> the YY <WH136> GOD <WH3069>.
And these are the goings out <WH8444> of the city <WH5892> on the north <WH6828> side <WH6285>, four <WH702> thousand <WH505> and five <WH2568> hundred <WH3967> measures <WH4060>.

And the gates <WH8179> of the city <WH5892> shall be after the names <WH8034> of the tribes <WH7626> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>: three <WH7969> gates <WH8179> northward <WH6828>; one <WH259> gate <WH8179> of Re'uven <WH7205>, one <WH259> gate <WH8179> of Y'hudah <WH3063>, one <WH259> gate <WH8179> of Levi <WH3878>.

And at the east <WH6921> side <WH6285> four <WH702> thousand <WH505> and five <WH2568> hundred <WH3967>: and three <WH7969> gates <WH8179>; and one <WH259> gate <WH8179> of Yosef <WH3130>, one <WH259> gate <WH8179> of Binyamin <WH1144>, one <WH259> gate <WH8179> of Dan <WH1835>.

And at the south <WH5045> side <WH6285> four <WH702> thousand <WH505> and five <WH2568> hundred <WH3967> measures <WH4060>: and three <WH7969> gates <WH8179>; one <WH259> gate <WH8179> of SHim`on <WH8095>, one <WH259> gate <WH8179> of Yissakhar <WH3485>, one <WH259> gate <WH8179> of Z'vulun <WH2074>.

At the west <WH3220> side <WH6285> four <WH702> thousand <WH505> and five <WH2568> hundred <WH3967>, with their three <WH7969> gates <WH8179>; one <WH259> gate <WH8179> of Gad <WH1410>, one <WH259> gate <WH8179> of Asher <WH836>, one <WH259> gate <WH8179> of Naftali <WH5321>.
It was round about <WH5439> eighteen <WH8083> <WH6240> thousand <WH505> measures: and the name <WH8034> of the city <WH5892> from that day <WH3117> shall be, The YY is there <WH3074>.
